title: Constant disconnects throughout the game
body:
For a week or two I've been having constant disconnects from the game, which usually last very short (2 or 3 seconds). 

I've tried a lot of things. New drivers, W7 > W10 upgrade, fresh league install, different router settings. All to no avail.

I really don't know what to do anymore :( Any tips?

replies.body:
There was an issue affecting certain countries in EUW yesterday, but given that your issue has been going on for weeks, it seems unrelated to this.  Since it can be difficult to track down and identify the specific root cause why you are getting these constant disconnects, make sure to use our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743)!  This will take a look at your past few patches and give you a health report on your connection, as well as some steps on how to improve it.

I hope this helps!  Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing any issues!
this is happening to me as well but im on NA
It turned out to be the modem. My ISP send me a new one and everything worked like a charm! Thanks for the help tho' :)

Yeah I have the same exact problem man I hate this so much lol.... literally lost a ranked game because of a random ass DC for like 3-5 seconds. I'm pretty sure it's the game not us. Mostly because I used to disconnect all the time because I had a wireless card but I have wired internet now and I had no problem running other things like browsers and other games that run on internet. The only problem is League for me, just random annoying DCs that cause me and my team to flat out lose ranked games that we should have won.
